remarks: Stoic logic Thema 3. Statement T3 of [Bobzien] p. 116-117 discusses Stoic logic thema 3. "When from two (assemblies) a third follows, and from the one that follows (i.e., the third) together with another, external external assumption, another follows, then other follows from the first two and the externally co-assumed one.  (Simp.  Cael. 237.2-4)" (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 17-Feb-2019.)
statement:
stoic3.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ch ) $.
stoic3.2 $e |- ( ( ch /\ th ) -> ta ) $.
stoic3 $p |- ( ( ph /\ ps /\ th ) -> ta ) $.
